update_plan.update_summary: The recent change in the Integrated Learning system requires updates to the project documentation due to the addition of metadata to the training summary file, affecting the tracking and reporting of data within the system.
key_changes: Addition of metadata to the training summary file
Configuration update for the Training Summary File

specific_updates.README.md: Update the README.md file with a clear explanation of the changes made to the Integrated Learning system, including the addition of metadata to the training summary file and its impact on the tracking and reporting of data.
specific_updates.master_blueprint.md: Revise the master_blueprint.md document to reflect the recent changes in the Training Summary File configuration and provide details about the metadata being recorded.
specific_updates.current_status.json: Update the current_status.json file with a description of the new metadata being added to the training summary file
